channel.title: I need help to make a server
channel.description: :( I dont know how to make a server ... If someone can help me plz write it here or send me a message to migdonioalberto@yahoo.com... Plz... :o

item.title: I need help to make a server
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“Ace tyras, post:6, topic:230205”][quote author=tonypker13 link=topic=302993.msg2433398#msg2433398 date=1221025892]
Dude, Why post this? Why even try to make a server if you have no clue?
that means your probably a horrible java coder…
Dude seriously, read the dang tuts!

Do you even have a router?
Do you know your default IP?
Do you even know how to portforward??

Seriously man… Learn to read -.-
~.~Tony~.~
[/quote]

  1. tony iv seen you on too many post flamin ppl
    2.LOOK IN TUT SECTION STOP ASKING HERE!!!
    3.tony every1 begins not know how…[/quote]
    LMAO! I had no clue how and I learned to go to the SERVER DEVELOPMENT topic.
    Dont even try to make a server if you have no clue! And Give me one of my posts that I “flamed” on.
    Then look at the topic!
    I reply to STUPID topics like this!
    Cmon man have common sence!
1. tony iv seen you on too many post flamin ppl 2.LOOK IN TUT SECTION STOP ASKING HERE!!!!! 3.tony every1 begins not know how......
Learn to spell, wtf do yo mean ME look in tuts. You should! And "tony every1 begins not know how......" Thats not even a sentence! FFS LEARN~!

Read full topic
